overview: Iwasaki, the chairman of a yakuza group, was an adoptive father and benefactor who raised George who was in the orphanage. However, Iwasaki took in George in order to satisfy his own lust. George sees another man called Ken being raped by Iwasaki and is reminded of his own situation. The bond that united the two was Iwasaki's violence and a need for revenge on Iwasaki. The two succeed in robbing enough money for their planned escape to Sri Lanka and talk about their dreams on the bed. However, Iwasaki wasn't going to let them go easily.
title: Minami ni tobu futari
